translation.en: And know that I will be calling for you one day.
translation.vi: And know that I will becalling for you one day.

translation.en: Go and drink gunpowder tea and playing draughts.
translation.vi: Go and drink gunpowder teaand playing draughts.

translation.en: No, no, no. You remember me. You remember your Commandant.
translation.vi: No, no, no. You remember me.You remember your Commandant.

translation.en: They will just lock you up in jail! You are stupid!
translation.vi: They will just lock you up in jail!You are stupid!

translation.en: the other ones, they'll come eat you.
translation.vi: the other ones,they'll come eat you.

translation.en: Just chop for you... [stammering] your heart.
translation.vi: Just chop for you...[stammering] your heart.

translation.en: -[soldier] Halt! Stop there! -[guns cocking]
translation.vi: -[soldier] Halt! Stop there!-[guns cocking]

translation.en: -Who are you? -[Preacher] NDF, sir!
translation.vi: -Who are you?-[Preacher] NDF, sir!

translation.en: Raise up your arms! All weapons in the air!
translation.vi: Raise up your arms!All weapons in the air!

translation.en: Don't look at my face! Put your weapons on the ground!
translation.vi: Don't look at my face!Put your weapons on the ground!

translation.en: Step back. Step back!
translation.vi: Step back.Step back!

translation.en: [Father Friday] Agu, how are you settling in?
translation.vi: [Father Friday]Agu, how are you settling in?

translation.en: [Agu] I am not knowing how long I am staying here...
translation.vi: [Agu] I am not knowinghow long I am staying here...

translation.en: All I am knowing is how it is feeling here.
translation.vi: All I am knowingis how it is feeling here.

translation.en: I am knowing the sound of people screaming and the smell of dead bodies...
translation.vi: I am knowing the sound of people screamingand the smell of dead bodies...

translation.en: and I am knowing the feeling of the brown-brown and djamba in my blood.
translation.vi: and I am knowing the feeling ofthe brown-brown and djamba in my blood.

translation.en: -They want us to die! -[boys] Yes!
translation.vi: -They want us to die!-[boys] Yes!

translation.en: -They want us to die! -[Father Friday] Calm!
translation.vi: -They want us to die!-[Father Friday] Calm!

translation.en: We need money for here. We need money. Eh?
translation.vi: We need money for here.We need money. Eh?

translation.en: Have you forgotten? We have food to eat.
translation.vi: Have you forgotten?We have food to eat.

translation.en: -We have shelter. -Shh!
translation.vi: -We have shelter.-Shh!

translation.en: -And even we learn, we learn. -Yeah.
translation.vi: -And even we learn, we learn.-Yeah.

translation.en: You NRC soldier, with the talk, you talk too much.
translation.vi: You NRC soldier,with the talk, you talk too much.

translation.en: -Preacher! -Let's go!
translation.vi: -Preacher!-Let's go!

translation.en: So if I look at a table, how can I talk to you?
translation.vi: So if I look at a table,how can I talk to you?

translation.en: is because I can't be explaining myself like baby,
translation.vi: is because I can't beexplaining myself like baby,

translation.en: I am like old man and she's like small girl
translation.vi: I am like old manand she's like small girl

translation.en: because I am fighting in war and she's not even knowing what war is.
translation.vi: because I am fighting in warand she's not even knowing what war is.

translation.en: Try to talk to me about some of your experiences...
translation.vi: Try to talk to me aboutsome of your experiences...

translation.en: I think if you talk to me about it, it will make you feel better.
translation.vi: I think if you talk to me about it,it will make you feel better.

translation.en: it will make me sad... and it will make you, too, sad.
